comprehensive_overview: Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform development library designed to provide low-level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D. It is used by video playback software, emulators, and popular games including Stardew Valley, Undertale, and more.
core_features: Cross-platform support, low-level access to audio, graphics, and input devices, hardware acceleration, support for OpenGL and Direct3D, easy to use API for multimedia applications, used in a wide range of software and games.
